item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

Ok i tried to put [code]public void appendDeath() {
if (deathDelay == 0 && isDead) {
Player opp = Server.engine.players[hitIndex];

		try {
			if (rights < 0) {
				dropStuff(opp.username);
			}[/code]

and when I die i stay with all my stuff, i don’t even drop the firecape , barrow gloves, armadyl gs and i was skulled
this is on Player.java

item.title: Quick Question!
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

Using Yous-World source z508.

This is my code:

[code]public void appendDeath() {
if (deathDelay == 0 && isDead) {
Player opp = Server.engine.players[hitIndex];

		try {
			if (rights < 3) {
				dropStuff(opp.username);
			}[/code]

If I make a “0” on try { if (rights < 3) { All persons including Owner, Admins, mods, and normal players will drop loot?

Because I just killed my brother : co-owner and he didn’t drop anything, that will fix it?

Read full topic
